sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react" import { v4 as uuidv4 } from "uuid" export default function TableForm({ description, setDescription, quantity, setQuantity, WRE, setWRE, price, setPrice, amount, setAmount, list, setList, }) { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newItems = { id: uuidv4(), description, quantity, WRE, price, amount, } setDescription("") setQuantity("") setWRE("") setPrice("") setAmount("") setList([...list, newItems]) console.log(list) } useEffect(() => { const calculateAmount = (amount) => { setAmount(quantity * price + WRE) } calculateAmount(amount) }, [amount, price, WRE, quantity, setAmount]) return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
setPrice(e.target.value)} />
setPrice(e.target.value)} />

{amount}

{/* Table items */} {list.map(({ id, description, quantity, price, amount }) => ( ))}
Description Quantity Work-related Expenses Price Amount
{description} {quantity} {price} {amount}
) }
